channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Update Structure Fire; INC#0410; 08:48AM; 1281 W Exposition Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3w9a6oj; Exposition Park; Upon making entry, firefighters located a contents-only fire and the first arriving fire company will handle. All other resources are canceled. No further details.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E15 E215 E226 E26 E34 RA15 RA246 RA815 SQ21 T15 T26; CH9; 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0410; 08:33AM; 1281 W Exposition Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3w9a6oj; Exposition Park; One story commercial building (approximately 50' x 75' and appears to be vacant) with smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E15 E215 E34 RA15 RA246 T15; CH9; 15; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Update Full River Rescue - COMPLETE 03/31/2023 INC#0363

item.description: Update Full River Rescue - COMPLETE; INC#0363; 08:28AM; 840 S Mission Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3M8jFwq; Boyle Heights; LAFD Air Ops conducted a hoist operation and safely rescued the patient stranded on the abutment of the bridge. The adult male patient is being transported to the hospital for medical evaluation. No further details.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E10 E14 E17 E203 E209 E210 E221 E25 E288 EM1 EM11 H5 H7 HA5 HA7 HR3 RA17 RA25 RA9 RA90 SC1 SW44 T10 T21 T3 T88 T9 UR88; CH5; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Full River Rescue; INC#0363; 08:26AM; 840 S Mission Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3M8jFwq; Boyle Heights; The patient moved downstream and is currently stationary near 7th street bridge. Firefighters and the Swift Water team are moving into place downstream while LAFD Air Ops is now on scene evaluating a potential hoist operation. The incident commander is determining which operation will be most effective and safe to execute. ; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E10 E14 E17 E203 E209 E210 E221 E25 E288 EM1 EM11 H5 H7 HA5 HA7 HR3 RA17 RA25 RA9 RA90 SC1 SW44 T10 T21 T3 T88 T9 UR88; CH5; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Full River Rescue; INC#0363; 07:57AM; 840 S Mission Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3M8jFwq; Boyle Heights; Firefighters in place along the river have visual confirmation of a patient under 6th Street bridge. There is approximately one foot of water moving at estimated 5 mph. Crews are moving in place to determine the most effective rescue method. ; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E14 E17 E203 E209 E221 E25 E288 EM1 H5 H7 HA5 HA7 HR3 RA17 RA25 RA90 SC1 SW44 T21 T3 T88 T9 UR88; CH5; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - NOW OUT; INC#1734; 11:14PM; 18805 Redwing St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3M5ROgy; Tarzana; Firefighters arrived to find a detached garage with obvious signs of an explosion but the fire blew itself out and there was no longer any active flames. Two patients (26yo F and 52yo M) are being transported in critical condition. LAFD Arson is enroute for the investigation. The 9-1-1 call was received at 10:56PM. No further details. ; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; AR1 BC17 E273 E293 E73 E83 E93 EM14 EM15 RA100 RA73 RA83 RA93 T73 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1584; 08:57PM; 14236 W Califa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JXfAs7; Van Nuys; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 23 minutes with no injuries reported. All occupants of the home were safely outside upon LAFD arrival. The bulk of the fire appears to be contents in one room and firefighters prevented it from extending through the home. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 E102 E239 E260 E39 E81 RA102 RA839 T39 T60; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1584; 08:34PM; 14236 W Califa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JXfAs7; Van Nuys; Two story, single family dwelling with heavy smoke showing. One additional task force requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 E102 E239 E39 RA102 T39; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1490; 07:40PM; 9924 S Towne Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/42Uzhtd; Green Meadows; KNOCKDOWN: 28 firefighters extinguished the fire in 13 minutes. The fire was contained to one unit (well involved) on the 2nd floor. Despite initial reports, there were no patients located and the unit appeared to be vacant. LAPD took one person into custody (involvement unknown) and LAFD Arson investigator is responding. There are no further details. ; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E264 E33 E65 EM13 RA21 RA65 RA864 T33 T64; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1490; 07:27PM; 9924 S Towne Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/42Uzhtd; Green Meadows; Two story, garden style apartment building with fire showing from one unit. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. There are unconfirmed reports of one possible burn patient. ; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E264 E33 E65 EM13 RA21 RA65 RA864 T33 T64; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart
